'''''"Tupu's Lushness"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Thundering Wayob Manifestation|text="Tupu's Lushness" &mdash; Vessel for the Will to Grow}} and not let the Electro Ward created by Tupu's Lushness reach more than half of it's maximum value.
